$  Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: https://goo.gl/ZZ4vBf

➳  http://www.blackmagiccraft.ca
➳  Facebook: https://goo.gl/hvNgQL

In this Totally Practical Knowledge episode I discuss some of the pitfalls you may face as a crafting DM. These DM tips will help you not loose motivation or get as stressed out about preparing for your game. Don't let yourself be overwhelmed with work as a Dungeon Master or as a crafter.
title: TPK: Mistakes to Avoid as a Crafting DM (Black Magic Craft Episode 062)
